venue.name: Boston Center for the Arts - Cyclorama

item.description:
Join us as we check out Spring Wine Fest. You will sample lots of different wines from around the world and delicious appetizers too. This is a fun event and draws a great crowd!


If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

Tickets are currently 2 for $99 and must be purchased in advance- the event usually sells out, please use this link to get your discounted tickets:
http://www.bostoneven...

Please be sure to buy your ticket for the evening event.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near ticket area. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Spring Wine Fest, Discounted Tix!
